          <title>
            <string language="en">Measuring current using an ammeter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen aktuell mit einem Amperemeter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure actuelle à l'aide d'un ampèremètre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medição atual usando um amperímetro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misurazione corrente per mezzo di un amperometro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση παρούσα χρησιμοποιώντας ένα αμπερόμετρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El medir actual con un amperímetro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These circuit diagrams show how an ammeter is connected to a circuit when measuring current.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammeter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Schaltpläne zeigen, wie ein Amperemeter an
einen Stromkreis angeschlossen wird, wenn man Strom mißt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces schémas de circuit montrent comment un 
ampèremètre est relié à un circuit en mesurant le courant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas de circuito mostram como um 
amperímetro é conectado a um circuito ao medir a corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi circuitali mostrano come un 
amperometro è collegato ad un circuito quando misura la corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα κυκλωμάτων επιδεικνύουν πώς ένα 
την αμπερόμετρο συνδέεται με ένα κύκλωμα κατά μέτρηση του 
ρεύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos esquemas circulares muestran cómo un 
amperímetro está conectado con un circuito al medir la corriente.</string>
          </description>
